quote: This is the strangest life I have ever known.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: The beautiful is always bizarre.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: All things are strange which are worth knowing.
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  In the Cities of Coin and Spice

quote: I used to think anyone doing anything weird was weird. Now I know that it is the people that call others weird that are weird.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Am I weird?""Yeah. But so what? Everybody's weird.
author: Stephen King,  Different Seasons

quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional.
author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72

quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
author: Dick Francis,  To the Hilt

quote: Every weirdo in the world is on my wavelength.
author: Thomas Pynchon

quote: Almost everything strange washes up near Miami.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.
author: Tim Burton

quote: Jonesing [10w] Is it odd of me that I'm Jonsesing for strange?
author: Beryl Dov

quote: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: I do love nothing in the world so well as you- is not that strange?
author: William Shakespeare,  Much Ado About Nothing

quote: Can all this just be an accident? Or could there be some alien intelligence behind it?
author: Gene Roddenberry

quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness — and call it love — true love.
author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love

quote: We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love.
author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love

quote: It kills me how these days everyone has clinical justification for their strangeness.
author: Miguel Syjuco,  Ilustrado

quote: Our mothers always remain the strangest, craziest people we've ever met.
author: Marguerite Duras

quote: We are unusual and tragic and alive.
author: Dave Eggers

quote: Everyone's a little crazy. Some people just hide it better than others.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer

quote: Love is the strangest, most illogical thing in the world.
author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight

quote: No, Miss Palmer. What is bizarre is that I currently have a vagina.
author: Karen Chance,  Curse the Dawn

quote: Must be weird for you, having your mom here.""Weird for me, weird for her, probably weird for you since you had to give up your swinging bachelor pad.""Mrs. Casnoff let me install my heart-shaped Jacuzzi in my new dorm room.""Cal,"I said with mock astonishment, "did you just make a joke?""Maybe.
author: Rachel Hawkins,  Demonglass

quote: Everyone is a little crazy. The only difference between us and them is that they hide it better.
author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Evolution of Mara Dyer

quote: Other than the voices in my head, I think I’m pretty normal.
author: Tom Upton,  Tiny Voices

quote: I am no longer surprise by situation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Those were strange days, now that I look back at them. In the midst of life, everything revolved around death.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Norwegian Wood

quote: I do not like odd things until I can understand them.
author: Robert Jordan,  The Great Hunt

quote: Good days, they come around the oddest corners.
author: Colum McCann,  Let the Great World Spin

quote: Dead. Never been that before. Not even once.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: What a strange thing!to be alivebeneath cherry blossoms.
author: Kobayashi Issa,  Poems

quote: Absurdity is one of the most human things about us: a manifestation of our most advanced and interesting characteristics.
author: Thomas Nagel

quote: Silly String [10w] Life' an absurdity radiating from a spine of silly string.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Nothing is ever certain.
author: Alice Sebold,  The Lovely Bones

quote: The truth will make you odd.
author: Judy Blume

quote: There is no mystery-- that's the beauty of it. We are entirely explicable to each other, and yet we stay. What a miracle that is.
author: Kamila Shamsie,  Broken Verses

quote: You cannot conceive, nor can I, of the appalling strangeness of the mercy of God.
author: Graham Greene,  Brighton Rock

quote: I discover myself on the verge of a usual mistake.
author: Walt Whitman,  Song of Myself

quote: Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.
author: Ransom Riggs,  Hollow City

quote: Coincidence is God's way of being anonymous.
author: Laura Pedersen,  Best Bet

quote: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Fate is like a strange, unpopular restaurant filled with odd little waiters who bring you things you never asked for and don't always like.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: I just sprayed cologne on my hand and then pet the back of my cat's head while he slept, and he woke up so confused, trying to sniff behind his neck and all around wondering what sweet attack he was under.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: All of sudden, this shooting star went by, and all I could think was that they were listening to us somehow.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Inspiration is always a surprising visitor.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas I'll never know.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I just thought of a great theory that explains everything. When I went to that party, I was abducted by aliens. They have created a fake Earth and fake high school to study me and my reactions. This certainly explains cafeteria food.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson,  Speak

quote: People say I make strange choices, but they’re not strange for me. My sickness is that I’m fascinated by human behavior, by what’s underneath the surface, by the worlds inside people.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: It’s strange how things can change back as suddenly as they changed originally. When one thing happens and suddenly, things are back to normal.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: It always shocked me when I realized that I wasn’t the only person in the world who thought and felt such strange and awful things.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
